pullrequest.title: Add scripts for key generation and bundling

content.raw:
In 095e467 I added the requirement to specify the VPN server's port number in each bundling step. That's to allow us to run two servers on one machine using different ports.

Unless there are objections, we should be able to merge this now. I'll file another PR with the scripts to start and stop the VPN server.
content.html:
In 095e467 I added the requirement to specify the VPN server's port number in each bundling step. That's to allow us to run two servers on one machine using different ports.

Unless there are objections, we should be able to merge this now. I'll file another PR with the scripts to start and stop the VPN server.
